newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB-120 index falls nine points to 822.4 pts.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB-120 index falls nine points to 822.4 pts.

text.p: The CNB-120 index, a broad daily measure of Czech equities, fell nine points on Monday to 822.4, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
Eight of the ten sectoral indices lost, with the banking index losing the most, down 24.7 points, or 2.16 percent, to 1,117.3 points.
